alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 14 at 3:06AM EST until January 14 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON EST TODAY THROUGH THIS EVENING FOR LOW HUMIDITY, ROBUST WINDS, AND HIGH ERC VALUES FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 072, 074, 172, AND 173... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 072 Metro Broward, Fire Weather Zone 074 Metro Miami-Dade, Fire Weather Zone 172 Coastal Broward and Fire Weather Zone 173 Coastal Miami-Dade. * WIND...20 foot winds around 10-15 mph * HUMIDITY...Low to mid 30s. * ERC...Upper 20s to low 30s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible upgrades to Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
